example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (LCP-TMP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VA 年轻))) (LC 时)) (VP (VA 厚实)))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 胸肌) )) (PU ，) (VP (IP-ADV (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 知) (NP-TMP (PN 何时))))) (VP (VRD (VV 塌落) (VV 到)) (NP-OBJ (NN 腹部) ))))
